acceptableUsePolicyForm.description: Link to signed Acceptable Use Policy (AUP) form

connection.description: The connection resource associated with this flow

subscriptionName.description: Name of the subscription with the connection

dataflowGuid.description: Dataflow GUID associated with this flow

dataTypes.description: List of data types that this Dataflow will service

dataUse.description: How will the data be used on the high side?

destination.description: What is the destination of this data? (beyond the high-side Storage Account?)

incidentNumber.description: ICM (Incident Management) number in high side where onboarding details are entered

accessForManualTransfers.description: Please confirm JIT will be used for manual transfers, whether that be access to the source Storage Container or any service which interacts with the Storage Account

keyVaultUri.description: AME, PME, or TORUS only! AKV Chain Containing SAS Token

usage.description: Does your service have manual upload through the Teleport pipeline

maxData.description: Enter the max (99th percentile) data sent in a day (GB)

origin.description: What is the system of origin for this data?

primaryContactAlias.description: Primary contact's alias for this data flow

secondaryContactsAliases.description: Secondary contacts' aliases for this dataflow

serviceTreeId.description: Service Tree ID of the service

subscriptionId.description: Subscription ID for the storage account to be onboarded

useCase.description: Use case for this data flow.

remoteCloud.description: Destination cloud of the data to be transferred

operationStatus.description: Operation status associated with the last patch request

status.description: Operation status for the last patch request for this connection.

id.description: Operation status ID of the last patch request for this connection.

message.description: Message for the operation for the last patch request for this connection.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

internalMetadata.description: Internal metadata of the connection inside pipeline.

statusSetBy.description: User that last set the approved status for this connection

remoteCloud.description: Remote cloud of the data to be transferred or received

flowNameParameter.description: The name for the flow that is to be onboarded.

connectionNameParameter.name: connectionName
connectionNameParameter.description: The name for the connection that is to be requested.

pipelineNameParameter.name: pipelineName
